function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global health crisis impacting SDGs","Impact":"Slow progress towards sustainable development goals, increase in poverty and hunger","Mitigation":"Implement social protection measures, support vulnerable populations, and ensure food security","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, remote healthcare technologies, and data analytics for resource allocation","People":"Vulnerable populations, people living in poverty, and those facing food insecurity","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and international organizations"}]}
